TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed SecurityAction extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the security actions that can be performed using declarative security.

span.span: Specifies the security actions that can be performed using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die folgende Tabelle beschreibt die Dauer jeder Sicherheitsaktion eingesetzt sind und die Ziele, die dies unterstützt.The following table describes the time that each security action takes place and the targets that it supports. > [!IMPORTANT] > In der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], Runtime-Unterstützung wurde für das Erzwingen der berechtigungsanforderungen verweigern, RequestMinimum, RequestOptional und RequestRefuse entfernt.In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], runtime support has been removed for enforcing the Deny, RequestMinimum, RequestOptional, and RequestRefuse permission requests. Diese Anforderungen sollten nicht in Code verwendet werden, der auf [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] oder höher basiert.These requests should not be used in code that is based on [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later. Weitere Informationen zu diesen und anderen Änderungen finden Sie unter [Sicherheitsänderungen](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).For more information about this and other changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). Sie sollten nicht UseLinkDemand in der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].You should not useLinkDemand in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. Verwenden Sie stattdessen die Verwendung auf voll vertrauenswürdige Anwendungen einschränken, oder bei Bedarf für teilweise vertrauenswürdige Aufrufer zu beschränken.Instead, use the to restrict usage to fully trusted applications, or use Demand to restrict partially trusted callers. |Deklaration von SicherheitsaktionDeclaration of security action|Zeitpunkt der AktionTime of action|Unterstützte ZieleTargets supported| |------------------------------------|--------------------|-----------------------| |`LinkDemand` (verwenden Sie nicht in der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])`LinkDemand` (do not use in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])|Just-in-Time-KompilierungJust-in-time compilation|-Methode-KlasseClass, method| |`InheritanceDemand`|LadezeitLoad time|-Methode-KlasseClass, method| |`Demand`|LaufzeitRun time|-Methode-KlasseClass, method| |`Assert`|LaufzeitRun time|-Methode-KlasseClass, method| |`Deny` (veraltete Elemente in der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])`Deny` (obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])|LaufzeitRun time|-Methode-KlasseClass, method| |`PermitOnly`|LaufzeitRun time|-Methode-KlasseClass, method| |`RequestMinimum` (veraltete Elemente in der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])`RequestMinimum` (obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])|GRANT-ZeitGrant time|AssemblyAssembly| |`RequestOptional` (veraltete Elemente in der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])`RequestOptional` (obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])|GRANT-ZeitGrant time|AssemblyAssembly| |`RequestRefuse` (veraltete Elemente in der [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])`RequestRefuse` (obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)])|GRANT-ZeitGrant time|AssemblyAssembly| Weitere Informationen zu Attributziele, finden Sie unter .For additional information about attribute targets, see . ## Examples In diesem Beispiel wird gezeigt, wie die CLR zu benachrichtigen, die Code in aufgerufenen Methoden nur , und veranschaulicht, wie aus dem isolierten Speicher gelesen und geschrieben.This example shows how to notify the CLR that code in called methods has only , and also demonstrates how to write and read from isolated storage. [!code-cpp[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/cpp/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/CS/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction Assert = int32(3)

summary.span: The calling code can access the resource identified by the current permission object, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource (see [Using the Assert Method](~/docs/framework/misc/using-the-assert-method.md)).

span.span: The calling code can access the resource identified by the current permission object, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource (see [Using the Assert Method](~/docs/framework/misc/using-the-assert-method.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction Demand = int32(2)

summary.span: All callers higher in the call stack are required to have been granted the permission specified by the current permission object.

span.span: All callers higher in the call stack are required to have been granted the permission specified by the current permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction Deny = int32(4)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This requests should not be used")

summary.span: The ability to access the resource specified by the current permission object is denied to callers, even if they have been granted permission to access it (see [Using the Deny Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25)).

span.span: The ability to access the resource specified by the current permission object is denied to callers, even if they have been granted permission to access it (see [Using the Deny Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25)).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction InheritanceDemand = int32(7)

summary.span: The derived class inheriting the class or overriding a method is required to have been granted the specified permission..

span.span: The derived class inheriting the class or overriding a method is required to have been granted the specified permission..

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction LinkDemand = int32(6)

summary.span: The immediate caller is required to have been granted the specified permission.

span.span: The immediate caller is required to have been granted the specified permission.

summary.span: For full trust, use instead; for partial trust, use .

span.span: For full trust, use instead; for partial trust, use .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction PermitOnly = int32(5)

summary.span: Only the resources specified by this permission object can be accessed, even if the code has been granted permission to access other resources.

span.span: Only the resources specified by this permission object can be accessed, even if the code has been granted permission to access other resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction RequestMinimum = int32(8)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This requests should not be used")

summary.span: The request for the minimum permissions required for code to run.

span.span: The request for the minimum permissions required for code to run.

summary.span: This action can only be used within the scope of the assembly.

span.span: This action can only be used within the scope of the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction RequestOptional = int32(9)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This requests should not be used")

summary.span: The request for additional permissions that are optional (not required to run).

span.span: The request for additional permissions that are optional (not required to run).

summary.span: This request implicitly refuses all other permissions not specifically requested.

span.span: This request implicitly refuses all other permissions not specifically requested.

summary.span: This action can only be used within the scope of the assembly.

span.span: This action can only be used within the scope of the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction RequestRefuse = int32(10)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This requests should not be used")

summary.span: The request that permissions that might be misused will not be granted to the calling code.

span.span: The request that permissions that might be misused will not be granted to the calling code.

summary.span: This action can only be used within the scope of the assembly.

span.span: This action can only be used within the scope of the assembly.
